input.sentences: my boss is telling the audience members to start the dinner .
my boss is getting ready to give his speech on fundraising .
my boss and the head chef are trying to make sure the tables and chairs are set properly .
most of my co-workers and colleagues attend the meeting .
after the speech is over my boss is getting ready to leave .
output.sentences: The employees were about to start dinner as their boss began telling them why they were there.
The boss gave his speech and announced that plans were complete so they were ready to begin fundraising.
With the tables properly set with a fabulous meal the employees began to discuss how to go about raising funds.
The workers set up important meeting with colleagues in similar businesses.
The boss gave the final speech of the night and with that everyone was ready to leave excited to raise the money.
